title: Explosive Growth: NEAR Protocol Caters To 3 Million Daily Users
description: As of Q3 2024, CryptoRank stated that 3 million addresses were active every day on NEAR Protocol, making it a ...
article:
Este artículo también está disponible en español.

As of Q3 2024, CryptoRank stated that 3 million addresses were active every day on NEAR Protocol, making it a major player in the blockchain world. This huge number is higher than both Tron (2 million daily active addresses) and Solana (2.4 million daily active addresses) during the same time period.

Related Reading
$6 Million ETH Sale: Ethereum Foundation Joins Whale Liquidation Frenzy
4 days ago

The growth of NEAR is in line with a larger trend in the AI cryptocurrency market. This shows that blockchain and AI are becoming more and more intertwined. This point of contact is driving more and more technological progress and user engagement across these channels.

Source: CryptoRank
Surge In The AI-Cryptocurrency Sector

One of the most important factors influencing user engagement on NEAR is the rapid growth in AI-related decentralized applications or dApps. As DappRadar reported, AI dApps increased by 70% compared with the previous quarter in Q3.

BitStarz Player Lands $2,459,124 Record Win! Could you be next big winner? Play Now!

The survey indicated that AI dApps garnered 4.3 million daily unique active wallets, illustrating the growing interest in this sector of the cryptocurrency industry. NEAR Protocol has swiftly leveraged this trend by establishing collaborations with major corporations such as Nvidia and Alibaba to augment its AI capabilities.

NEAR market cap currently at $5.5 billion. Chart: TradingView

With this further integration with AI, in addition to NEAR’s strong growing ecosystem, the network finds itself at the helm of innovation in this emerging blockchain landscape. Although the ecosystem is still experiencing positive growth, market sentiment remains cautious as the price of the protocol decreased by 2.36% to $4.87, along with a more than 30% decrease in trading volume.

NEAR Protocol: Price Fluctuations Amid Market Ambiguity

The current price difficulties of NEAR can be ascribed to overarching market conditions rather than the protocol’s intrinsic value. Despite the optimistic outlook suggested by daily active addresses and collaborations, recent data indicates a 0.4% reduction in NEAR’s circulating supply, now totaling 1.11 billion tokens. The protocol’s market capitalization now stands at $5.42 billion, ranking it 23rd overall in the market.

NEAR price projected to rise. Source: CoinCheckup
Related Reading
Could XRP Finally Hit $1? Key Factors To Consider, According To Analysts
3 days ago
Price Forecast Indicates Rebound Potential

The medium-term prognosis for NEAR is predominantly favorable. Technical analysis forecasts an upward trend in the forthcoming seven days, with the token presently trading 220% beneath its projected value for the subsequent month. During a three-month interval, the price is anticipated to rise by 240%, indicative of favorable market sentiment and heightened adoption.

Prolonged projections are similarly positive, with a six-month growth anticipated at 178% and a one-year projection indicating a 165% increase. Although short-term price fluctuations may indicate general market instability, the long-term prospects for NEAR are clear. Investors must keep tabs of forthcoming ecosystem advancements and AI trends to assess the protocol’s price trajectory.

Featured image from Pexels, chart from Avark

title: NEAR Protocol (NEAR) Breaks Resistance: Investors Speculate If GoodEgg (GEGG) Is the Next Cryptocurrency Set to Explode with 74% Stage 2 Presale Complete?
description: The world of cryptocurrency is dynamic, with numerous coins showing potential for massive gains. Recently, Near Protocol (NEAR) has been ...
article:
Este artículo también está disponible en español.

The world of cryptocurrency is dynamic, with numerous coins showing potential for massive gains. Recently, Near Protocol (NEAR) has been making waves after breaking through key resistance levels, leading investors to speculate on the next big thing. With GoodEgg (GEGG) completing 74% of its Stage 2 presale, many are wondering if this new AI-driven memecoin could be the next cryptocurrency set to explode.

Near Protocol (NEAR) Breaks Resistance, Eyes Further Gains

Near Protocol (NEAR) has captured significant attention in the market over the past few weeks. Its recent rally, fueled by bullish sentiment, led to impressive weekly gains of 34.5%, with a 12% surge in just 24 hours. At the time of writing, Near Protocol (NEAR) has broken through key resistance levels, particularly at $4.366, which has now turned into a support zone, setting the stage for even more gains.

According to recent analysis, Near Protocol (NEAR) is positioned within a symmetric triangle pattern, a technical setup often indicative of continued upward momentum. If NEAR can break through the resistance level of $5.256, it is likely to surge toward $6.4, with potential further gains that could see the token reach as high as $7.6.

BitStarz Player Lands $2,459,124 Record Win! Could you be next big winner? Play Now!

The bullish sentiment surrounding Near Protocol (NEAR) is supported by strong technical indicators. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) currently sits at 68.5, suggesting ongoing accumulation and positive momentum. Meanwhile, NEAR’s Bollinger Bands (BB) have moved above the upper threshold, indicating the possibility of short-term volatility. Nevertheless, the overall outlook remains bullish, with many analysts predicting that NEAR will continue its rally in the coming days.

GoodEgg (GEGG): The Next Big Explosion?

While Near Protocol (NEAR) continues to gain traction, another cryptocurrency has entered the spotlight: GoodEgg (GEGG). This AI-driven memecoin, which combines the fun of meme culture with real utility in the dating space, has been rapidly gaining attention during its presale phase. With 74% of its Stage 2 presale now complete, GoodEgg (GEGG) is positioning itself as a serious contender in the crypto world.

GoodEgg (GEGG) leverages artificial intelligence to create a unique dating platform that uses social scoring to match users based on various criteria. This combination of AI technology and blockchain provides a level of innovation rarely seen in the meme coin space. As investors look for the next big opportunity, GoodEgg (GEGG) is quickly becoming a favored choice, thanks to its potential to disrupt both the cryptocurrency and social networking industries.

The success of GoodEgg (GEGG)’s presale has not gone unnoticed. Early investors are already positioning themselves for what could be a massive rally once the coin hits the market. The current presale price of $0.00021 offers significant upside potential, with some analysts predicting that GoodEgg (GEGG)) could see gains similar to those of other successful meme coins like Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB).

NEAR vs. GEGG: Which is the Better Investment?

The ongoing success of Near Protocol (NEAR) and the rising hype around GoodEgg (GEGG) have left many investors wondering which of these cryptocurrencies holds the most promise. On one hand, Near Protocol (NEAR) is a well-established blockchain platform with a focus on decentralized applications and scalability. Its recent price movements suggest that NEAR could be in for further gains, particularly if it continues to break through key resistance levels.

On the other hand, GoodEgg (GEGG) offers something entirely different. As an AI-driven memecoin, it combines entertainment with real utility, making it an attractive option for those looking to diversify their portfolios. The potential for exponential growth, especially during its presale stages, makes GoodEgg (GEGG) a high-risk, high-reward investment.

Closing Insight,

As the cryptocurrency market continues to evolve, both Near Protocol (NEAR) and GoodEgg (GEGG) present compelling opportunities for investors. Near Protocol (NEAR)’s recent price movements indicate that it is well-positioned for further gains, especially if it can continue to break through resistance levels. Meanwhile, GoodEgg (GEGG) offers a unique investment opportunity, combining AI-driven technology with the fun of meme culture.

With GoodEgg (GEGG) completing 74% of its Stage 2 presale, now may be the perfect time for investors to get in on the ground floor of what could be the next big explosion in the crypto world. Whether you’re looking for stability with Near Protocol (NEAR) or seeking higher potential returns with GoodEgg (GEGG), both cryptocurrencies are worth keeping an eye on as the market heats up.
